title: Penalties
context: ยง431:8-211 Penalties. (a) Any person, other than an insured, who represents or aids an unauthorized insurer in violation of this part may be subject to a fine not in excess of $1,000. (b) Any unauthorized insurer who transacts any unauthorized act of an insurance business as set forth in this part may be fined not more than $10,000. [L 1987, c 347, pt of ยง2; am L 1989, c 207, ยง6; am L 2006, c 154, ยง8]
